_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The eight perspectives about the deities: Perceiving light but not seeing visions
Associating with those deities, conversing, and engaging in discussion
Finding out which orders of gods those deities come from
Finding out what deeds caused those deities to be reborn there after passing away from here
Finding out what deeds caused those deities to have such food and such an experience of pleasure and pain
Finding out that these deities have a life-span of such a length
Finding out whether or not the Buddha had previously lived together with those deities.
